fulltext:
VƯƠNG NGUYỄN MỸ HÀ 
(+84)834567312 | havuong138@gmail.com | Skype: havuong813 | Linkedin: havuong813 | HCMC 
SUMMARY OF QUALIFICATIONS 
IT Professional with around 8 years works experience in Software Testing Domain both in Agile and 
Waterfall methodologies. 
5 years of experience in Manual Testing (designing and developing Test plans, Test scenarios, Test 
cases, Test Data and Test reports) 
3 years of experience in Automated the Regression/Smoke/Functional Test Cases of Web Based 
Application (using Selenium Webdriver, Maven, TestNG, Cucumber and Jenkins) 
Experienced in designing and implementing different Automation Frameworks from scratch like Page 
Object Model, Data Driven framework, Behavior Driven Development 
Proficient in the performance of Functional, GUI, Regression, Integration, Exploratory, User 
Acceptance Testing. 
Proficient in cross-browser testing (IE, Firefox, Chrome, Safari) as well as Mobile testing on different 
devices (Android, iOS). 
Basic knowledge of Appium, Protractor, WebdriverIO, Selenium Grid, JMeter, SoapUI, JavaScript, 
TypeScript. 
Comfortable working as a member of the integrated team as well as independently. 
Ability to learn or adapt New Technologies faster and apply at the workplace. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
SD Methodologies: Agile, Scrum, Kanban, Waterfall 
Automation Tools: Selenium, Appium, Protractor, WebdriverIO, Cypress, Jmeter 
Programming Languages: Java, Typescript 
Test Framework: TestNG, JUnit, Jasmine, Mocha 
Defect Tracking Tools: Redmine, Mantis, Jira, Trello 
Infrastructure: SVN, Git 
Collaborate Tools: Confluence, Slack  
CI: Jenkins
EXPERIENCE 
May 2019 – Current 
INLIEU - THE ULTIMATE PLATFORM FOR CHARITABLE GIVING 
(Freelance) 
Developer in Test 
 Analyzed the requirements & testing related issues 
 Executed test cases and validating the functionality. 
 Participated in the work through meeting, design test plan, test case & test 
data preparation 
 Supported end users for UAT Testing 
Dec 2017 – Feb 2019 
QUOINE – FINANCIAL SERVICES ON THE BLOCKCHAIN 
(Full-time) 
Senior Test Automation Engineer 
 Performed review and analysis of User Stories to design Test Scenario & Test 
Case by BDD 
 Wrote test scripts for previous sprints using Selenium, Cucumber, Java 
 Researched new technology, testing methods to share knowledge with other 
team members and apply to incoming projects 
 Wrote with other teams to improve the process of Quality Assurance 
 Attended status meetings & updated the management with daily & weekly 
status report of all the testing activities. 
Sep 2017 – Dec 2017 
SRA – A REGULATORY BODY FOR SOLICITORS IN ENGLAND AND WALES. 
(Contract) 
Senior Quality Control 
 Provided testing for the integration of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and 
Operations whilst liaising with the supplier.  
 Used JIRA for acceptance criteria to write test cases, defect reports and defect 
tracking for regression testing. 
 Used Microsoft CRM to manipulate user data to create pre-requisitions for 
testing. 
 Wrote test scripts for previous sprints using Selenium, Cucumber, Java 
 Participated in daily stand-ups and providing any updates from the test. 
Apr 2016 – May 2017 
TRANSCOSMOS TECHNOLOGIC ARTS CO., LTD – JAPAN SOFTWARE OUTSOURCING COMPANY 
(Full-time) 
Senior Quality Control 
 Agile development - Participate in daily scrum meetings to report daily 
progress 
 Performed review and analysis of functional requirements and test plan design 
documentation. 
 Developed work breakdown structure (WBS), test plan, test scenarios and 
test cases based on functional business requirement specifications and design 
documents, maintain checklists for regression test 
 Refresher training on work style, process, techniques and test views 
 Review Test Cases which is written by other Team Members 
 Helped Dev team understand the requirements and improve Unit test quality 
Sep 2014 – Apr 2016 
AIRME – START UP PROJECT ON E-COMMERCE 
(Freelance) 
Developer in Test 
 Used Selenium WebDriver for writing test scripts for regression test coverage 
 Coordinated with developers and record defects in Trello to track until they 
are resolved 
 Prepared and execute test scripts using JMeter to perform Web Services 
testing 
 Preparation of data requirements for each Sprint release and preparation of 
test cases design and review and publishing during the demo. 
 Maintenance of existing Automation scenarios 
 Executed automation scenarios for Regressing Testing 
 Participated in User Acceptance Testing with the clients for every release 
Key Learnt Points: Patience, analytical and critical thinking 
Apr 2011 – Jul 2014  
BACH TUOC SO JSC – A SPECIALIZED PRODUCTION AND DISTRIBUTION OF ONLINE GAMES 
(Full-time) 
Quality Assurance 
 Developed mathematical models to make the game more compelling and 
increase revenue 
 Balanced the statistics to keep the game stable 
 Coordinated with all stakeholders (management, programming, painter, 
executive game) to ensure the game meets the quality standard 
 Researched and analyze user’s feedback, statistics to capture trends and user 
behaviors and recommend effective resolutions 
 Prepared and execute test strategies, test plans, test cases, data quality and 
specific measures 
 Executed testing quality, sound, appearance, and functionality of games 
 Worked on multiple platforms (Windows Phone, Android, iOS ...) and familiar 
with many types of games  
Key Learnt Points: Problem solving, communication, planning skill, work under pressure. 
EDUCATION 
2018 - 2019 
TAU – Test Automation University 
 Automate web UI tests with Cypress 
 Automated Visual Testing with Applitools 
 Automating in the Browser using Javascript 
 Automating your API tests with REST Assured 
LinkedIn Learning 
 Software Testing: Exploratory Testing 
 Multi Module Build Automation with Maven 
Online Course 
 Angular E2E Testing with Protractor/ Typescript/ CucumberJS 
 Security Testing (OWASP Top 10 - 2017) 
2014 - 2017 
UDEMY.COM 
 Course: Appium - Mobile Automation Testing 
 Course: Cucumber with Selenium Java 
 Course: Selenium WebDriver With Java 
 Course: Web Application Performance Testing 
UDACITY.COM 
 Course: UX Design for mobile developers 
2007 – 2010 
NATIONAL INSTITUTE FOR INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY (NIIT), HCMC   
 Course: Programming Software - Java 
2005 – 2006 
HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY   
 Major: Intermediate Technician 
OTHER SKILLS 
LANGUAGE 
 Vietnamese: Native 
 English: Intermediate 
 Japanese: N4 certificate
